# .NET MAUI Mobile App Project Setup

## Project Overview
Creating MyNetAppMobile - a .NET MAUI cross-platform mobile application that connects to the existing MyNetApp backend.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file exists
- [ ] Get .NET MAUI project setup information
- [ ] Scaffold the .NET MAUI project
- [ ] Customize project with MVVM architecture
- [ ] Install required NuGet packages
- [ ] Compile and verify the project
- [ ] Create documentation

## Project Requirements
- Platform: .NET MAUI (iOS & Android)
- Architecture: MVVM pattern
- Backend API: Existing MyNetApp .NET API
- Features: Auth, Chat, Status feed, Notifications, User profiles
- Real-time: SignalR for chat and notifications
